mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM country) AS totalCountries, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT currency_code) FROM bank WHERE currency_code != 'KRW') AS availableCountries, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT currency_code) FROM user_favorite_currency) AS totalFavorites

SELECT CONCAT(c.country_name, ' - ', c.code_name, '(', c.code, ')') AS favoriteContents, COUNT(ufc.currency_code) AS cnt FROM user_favorite_currency ufc LEFT JOIN country c ON ufc.currency_code = c.code GROUP BY ufc.currency_code ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 5
